field.label: Enter the name of the file
field.required: You must enter a title for the file.

field.label: Enter a description for the file
File type
field.hint: Personal picture, logo, main article, etc.

field.label: Internal administrative information
field.hint: Delete any notes that have been acted on and are completed or no longer relevant.

field.label: Author
field.hint: Cataloguers: 'First 3 + UCD et al.' Form must be unique within RRU author index. For UCD authors, use form in RRU author index or VIAF.org or UCD RMS or as appears in work. For non-UCD authors, use form in RRU author index or as appears in work. Re-enter any names with diacritics, ensuring UTF-8 encoding is used.

field.label: Editor
field.hint: Enter the names of any editors of this item below. Use form enumerated in 'Author' above.

field.label: Contributor
field.hint: Enter the names of any other contributors to this item below. Use form enumerated in 'Author' above.

field.label: Photographer
field.hint: Enter the names of any photographers who contributed to this item below. Use form enumerated in 'Author' above.

field.label: Title
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.
field.hint: Enter the main title as it appears on the version of record. Any capitalisation is acceptable except all-caps. Remove final full-stop.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, e.g. working titles, translated titles etc. enter them below.

field.label: Date of Publication
field.required: You must enter at least the year
field.hint: Month and day are not required. Day must be two digits.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Use AACR2.

field.label: Item type
field.required: Please select an item type
field.hint: Select the appropriate item type from the dropdown box.

field.label: Peer review status
field.required: Please select a value for peer review status
field.hint: If this item has been through a peer review process, select 'Peer reviewed'.

field.label: Language
field.required: Please select at least one language
field.hint: Select the language or languages of the main content of the item. Hold down the 'Ctrl' or 'Shift' key to select more than one.

field.label: Sponsor or funding body
field.hint: If you are required to deposit this paper by your funding organisation(s), select here. Hold down the 'Ctrl' or 'Shift' key to select more than one. Use 'Ctrl' + click to deselect.

field.label: Other sponsor or funing body
field.hint: Other Plan-S funders: UKRI, WHO

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Enter one keyword per box below (minimum one keyword required). Only capitalise the first letter of the first word of each keyword unless lower case is required for technical reasons (e.g. cAMP).

field.label: JEL codes for RePEc items
field.hint: One JEL code per field

field.label: Journal Title
field.hint: Complete the following five fields (Journal title, Volume, Issue, Start Page and End page) for journal articles only.

field.label: Other citation info
field.hint: For conference publications, enter the conference name, date and place, e.g.: ICIC17: 17th International Conference on Integrated Care, Dublin, Ireland, 8-10 May 2017

field.label: Details of larger work or publication
field.hint: If the item forms part of a larger work, e.g. a book, report or proceedings, enter the author/editor and title in the form Surname, Initial., Surname, Initial. (eds.). Title

field.label: Series or research strand
field.hint: If the item is item part of a series, enter the name of the series, click 'add' and enter the series number in a second field

field.label: Link to other versions
field.hint: Enter URL/link to items online if no DOI is available. For books/chapters, enter direct link to item on publisher's website, failing that, to direct link to Amazon.co.uk. Remove trailing parameters in Amazon URLs, a clean example is: http://www.amazon.co.uk/Finnegans-Wake-Oxford-Worlds-Classics/dp/0199695156. For conference papers, conference website is useful if no other link available.

field.label: Link to dataset
field.hint: Enter URL/link to a dataset or datasets which this research is based on where available online. DOI or other persistent link is preferable.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes below. Enter ISSN or other identifiers when DOI is not available and/or publication is difficult to locate by any other means.

field.label: Copyright date and holder (e.g. 2012 the Authors)
Publisher's set text
field.hint: Please add a license

field.label: Embargo end date
field.hint: Administrative note only. Set embargo at the bitstream/upload level. Enter the date (required format: YYYY-MM-DD) that the paper should be released from embargo. You can enter a year ('2020'), a year and month ('2020-04'), or year, month and day ('2020-12-05'). Enter 'forever' for a permanent embargo. Delete if the date has already passed.

field.label: Check date
field.hint: Enter explanatory note in description.admin. Standard practice is six months from the current date. Day must be two digits. Reports are run quarterly.

field.label: External notes
field.hint: Publicly visible notes, e.g. quality of digitized item and location of hard copy<

field.label: Author
field.required: Please enter the author's name.
field.hint: Enter your Surname followed by your first name(s) in the appropriate boxes below.

field.label: Thesis title
field.required: You must enter a title for this item.
field.hint: Enter full thesis title separating any subtitles with a colon. Capitalise the first letter of the first word in the title and use lowercase lettering thereafter except for proper nouns.

field.label: Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, e.g. working titles, translated titles etc. enter them below.

field.label: Year degree awarded
field.required: You must enter at least the year.
field.hint: Month and day are not required.

field.label: Language
field.required: Please select at least one language
field.hint: Select the language or languages of the main content of the item. Hold down the 'Ctrl' or 'Shift' key to select more than one.

field.label: Degree type
field.required: Please select a degree type
field.hint: Select the appropriate degree type from the dropdown box.

field.label: Degree name (uncontrolled)
field.hint: Select the controlled version of this degree type in the dropdown box below. For use in automated uploads.

field.label: Degree name
field.required: Please select a degree name<
field.hint: Select the appropriate degree name from the dropdown box.

field.label: Abstract
field.required: Please enter an abstract for the thesis. The abstract required when submitting the printed thesis is recommended.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Enter keywords which accurately describe your research. Enter one keyword per box (minimum one keyword required, three recommended). A keyword may be a multiple-word phrase. Only capitalise the first letter of the first word of each keyword unless lower case is required for technical reasons (e.g. cAMP).

field.label: MARC600 PersonalName
field.hint: Enter indicators and subfields in the following format: ii|s|s|s... Enter # for blank indicators. E.g.: 10|aJoyce, James,|d1882-1941.|tFinnegan's wake

field.label: MARC610 CorporateName
field.hint: Enter indicators and subfields in the following format: ii|s|s|s... Enter # for blank indicators. E.g.: E.g.: 14|aIreland.|bOireachtas.|bD????il|xElections.

field.label: MARC650 TopicalTerm
field.hint: Enter indicators and subfields in the following format: ii|s|s|s... Enter # for blank indicators. E.g.: #0|aWomen|xEmployment|xLaw and legislation|zIreland.

field.label: MARC651 GeographicName
field.hint: Enter indicators and subfields in the following format: ii|s|s|s... Enter # for blank indicators. E.g.: #0|aIreland|xCivilization|y1172.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Use AACR2

field.label: Peer-review status
field.hint: If this item has been through a peer review process, select 'Peer reviewed'.

field.label: Sponsor or funding body
field.hint: Hold down the 'Ctrl' or 'Shift' key to select more than one. Use 'Ctrl' + click to deselect.

field.label: Other sponsor or funding body
field.hint: Add funders that are not listed above here.

field.label: Copyright date and holder (e.g. 2012 the Authors)
RRU reuse license
field.required: Please add a license.
field.hint: Reuse license for this item. Default value is CC-BY-NC-ND. For SFI items submitted for publication after 1 Jan 2021, use CC-BY.

field.label: Check date
field.hint: Enter explanatory note in description.admin. Standard practice is six months from the current date. Day must be two digits. Reports are run quarterly.

field.label: External notes
field.hint: Publicly visible notes, e.g. quality of digitized item and location of hard copy

field.label: Embargo option
field.hint: Administrative note only. Set embargo at the bitstream/upload level. Enter the date (required format: YYYY-MM-DD) that the paper should be released from embargo. You can enter a year ('2020'), a year and month ('2020-04'), or year, month and day ('2020-12-05'). Enter 'forever' for a permanent embargo. Delete if the date has already passed.

field.label: Additional comments
field.hint: Please enter any additional information to assist Library staff to correctly describe and archive your thesis.

field.label: Organisation name
field.required: You must enter at least the organisation of your affiliation.

field.label: Organisation name
field.required: You must enter the organisation

field.label: Qualification Title
field.required: You must enter the qualification title.

field.label: Degree/Title
field.required: You must enter the degree/title

field.label: Organisation name
field.required: You must enter the organisation

field.label: Site URL
field.required: You must enter at least the site url.

field.label: Preferred Name
field.required: You must enter least at the Surname.

field.label: ORCID
field.hint: Settable by connecting the entity with ORCID
